record.text: I recently used wheretosleep.com for the first time to book a room online at the Sherlock hotel for a business trip to Milwaukee. Upon arriving at the hotel, they had no record of my reservation, and I was forced to pay the hotel. The wheretosleep.com customer service told me that they did pay the Sherlock hotel. I believe that the hotel lost the reservation in their system but did get paid by wheretosleep.com.
